## Current challenges

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}

:::: {.mybox}

::: {.mybox-header}
Perspectives for patient-specific applications
:::

::: {.mybox-body}

* Implementation of the poro-mechanics lung model 
  * **Nonlinear** - non polynomial loss
  * *Greedy* Latin hypercube sampling (LHS) to be tested
* Parametrisation of the segmented **geometries**
  * Variational encoder to reduce the segmentation's parametrisation's dimensionnality

:::
